description: Unit test suite for verifying the functionality of the ProjectInitializer and related classes in the 'universalinit' package. It includes tests for project setup, configuration loading, template processing, file copying, and scripts execution.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Fixture for creating and tearing down a temporary directory for tests.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture for creating a mock template directory with configuration and template files.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture for creating a sample ProjectConfig object for testing.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that a project can be initialized correctly, verifying file creation and content substitution.

methods.name: test_get_run_command(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that the template generates the correct run command.

methods.name: test_get_entry_point_url(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that the template provides the correct entry point URL.

methods.name: test_missing_required_parameters(template_dir)
methods.description: Test initialization failure with missing parameters.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Test execution of post-processing scripts triggered during project setup.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Verify that configuration can be loaded from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensure template variable substitution occurs correctly within file contents.

methods.name: test_extra_files_single_file(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Copy and verify extras files outside template, checking replacements.

methods.name: test_extra_files_directory(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Copy and verify directories with nested files, ensuring correct replacements.

methods.name: test_extra_files_nonexistent_path(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensure nonexistent extra files do not cause errors and are skipped gracefully.

methods.name: test_extra_files_with_binary_content(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Copy binary files as extras and verify content integrity after copying.
